user_instruction: 'Respond to Sarah'"'"'s email about the "Quantum Cohesion 2023" retreat. You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Quick follow-up on “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat

Hi John,

When you have a moment, could you please take a look at the email I sent about the “Quantum Cohesion 2023” retreat and let me know your thoughts? All of the supporting details are in your Gmail (sent yesterday afternoon) and in NotionManager under Social Committee → Retreat 2023.

Your feedback on the schedule draft and budget notes would be really helpful before our next planning touch-base.

Thanks a lot!

Best,
Sarah

final_output:
